body: - removed fonts from repo, they're now available on releases in the emojione-assets repo

name: 3.1.1 Library Patch
body:
This release includes several bugfixes and updates, including:
 - fix for cdn path on toImage conversion not setting properly
 - updates to emoji.json file structure - additions only (see UPGRADE.md for current structure)

name: EmojiOne 3.1 Release
body:
This 3.1 release includes Unicode 10 emoji data such as Mermaid/man/person, Vampire, and Climber. Other minor fixes/improvements also included:
  * emojiSize property properly integrated
  * extras/alpha-codes now includes "output" code point
  * improvements to JS and PHP unicode-matching regex

name: 3.0.3 Library Patch
body:
This release includes two bug fixes for the JavaScript library:
 - error returned when Unicode value is matched in regex but not a valid or desired match (e.g. `#`), fixes #494 
 - incorrect class applied for diverse emoji when using sprites, fixes #493

name: 3.0.2 Libary Patch
body: This release contains fixes for several issues, including the removal of `*` and `#` in Unicode matching, the inclusion of ASCII matching in JavaScript `unicodeToImage` function, the addition of `riskyMatchAscii` for PHP and JavaScript, and the addition of alternate sprite size markup. Please see the updated UPGRADE.md doc for more information on PHP and JavaScript `emojione` object properties.

name: 3.0.1 Library Patch
body: This release adds (y) as an ASCII reference for thumbsup to PHP and JS libraries, as well as repairs a problem with the minifying of emojione.min.js, and cleans up ASCII replacement in PHP libraries.

name: EmojiOne 3.0 Release
body: The 3.0 release brings about many breaking changes, please see the README for a complete description. Changes include splitting of the image assets into their own repo, merging the emoji-alpha-codes repo, and a largely restructured emoji.json file. Be sure to review the new licensing structure for image assets as well.

name: Improvements to conversion scripts
body:
2.2.7 Includes several updates to conversion scripts, including:
 -expanded libraries to include FEOF and ZWJ sequences for improved conversion
 -optional title tag attribute for img tag
 -title attribute for img tag displays shortname for unicode or shortname conversion, and ASCII for ASCII conversion
 -added explicit https: protocol for external paths
 -minor updates to several emoji meta data

name: Bug Fix/Pride Flag Update
body: This release includes the addition of the Gay Pride Flag (1f3f3-1f308) to the artwork, as well as the removal of asterisk, pound sign, and digit (0-9) replacement which was causing unexpected results.

name: Update to Unicode 9 Release
body: This update improves data in emoji.json and emoji_strategy.js, includes improved categorization for unicode 9 characters, and updates libraries accordingly.

name: Unicode 9 Release Updates
body: Updated libraries for JS and PHP.

name: Official Unicode 9 Release
body: This release marks the official launch of Unicode 9, including the addition of Unicode 9 data in emoji.json and emoji_strategy.json.

name: Renamed UC9 Artwork
body: This release addresses finalized Unicode 9 code points for all assets. This also includes skintone modifier emoji for all assets.

name: Update to address SVG issues
body: This update addresses an issue with how SVG files were rendered in v2.2.0.

name: 2016 Q2 Artwork Update
body: 624 artwork upgrades.

name: JS .toShort() patch and new aliases
body:
Includes a small patch to the JS implementation of toShort(), fixing an issue with excluded html tags.
Added aliases for `:custard:` - `:flan:` & `:pudding:`
Added an alias for :+1: `:thumbup:` and :-1: `:thumbdown:` plus skin tone versions of those.

name: JS toShort() and Python updates
body: Merged PR's #53 and #217

name: PNG sprite changes & new ascii mapping
body:
Changes to the PNG sprite sheet and CSS in an attempt to fix the poor rendering in the latest release of Chrome.
- 1 pixel padding added in the sprite sheet
- CSS background-position changed from percentage to pixel offset
- CSS width and height changed to 64px
- removed CSS background-size
- removed unnecessary sprite SASS file

Updated ascii and PNG demos to reflect new changes.
Changed :)  :-)  :] =] =) mapping from :smile: to :slight_smile:
Bumped cache busting param.

name: updates and fix
body:
Fixed PHP unicode regex.
Bumped cache busting param.
Early addition of Unicode 9.0 FE0F variation modifiers.

name: 2016 Q1 update
body: 265 emoji revisions

name: javascript static regexp moved to variables
body:
- static regexp in the javascript library moved to variables
- `:paw_prints:` shortname alias added
- demo copyright dates updated
- cache busting param updated

name: patch for handling long codes
body: Family and couple emoji were only partially being converted in some functions.

name: code patches
body: Updates made to some regular expressions.

name: Unicode 7.0
body: Added new Unicode 7.0 emoji. This update also includes many revisions to the original emoji. Necessary library files have also been updated to correspond with the new release.

name: PHP library update
body: Modifications to the PHP library architecture which includes new client and ruleset interfaces.

name: 1.4 - Tea and Coffee Emojis
body: Updates to the Tea and Coffee Emoji, Also been doing some work on the repo itself, set up grunt to handle the sprite creation and other automatable tasks.

name: 1.3.1 - Security updates
body:
Version 1.3.1
- Fixes #61 - security vulnerability 

Getting our Unicode 7.0 updates ready, expect to see those in the pipeline soon!

name: Flags Update
body: With this release, Emoji One becomes the first emoji set to contains every country flag. :smile:

name: NPM fix
body: This fixes an issue with our package.json, which should allow proper requiring of Emoji One in npm.

name: Adjustments
body: Switched emoji sizing and vertical alignment to be based on ex units rather than em, as it's more vertically accurate across different font-families.

name: Emoji One 1.2.0
body:
This release improves many issues with a lot of the japanese characters within the set, adds proper CommonJS support, and integration of PNG and SVG spritesheets. We've also added an entirely new demos section with more clearer and more advanced usage examples.

 Fixes issues: #3 #8 #10 #11 #14 #16 #20

name: Bug fixes
body:
Fixes issue #1 - compressed all image assets
Conversion script bug fixes

name: Optimizing crossbrowser
body: In this version we've added further improvements to optimizing the display across all browsers, specifically addressing rendering issues found in Firefox. This resulted in switching SVG emoji to use objects instead of image tags.

name: Further display adjustments
body: v1.0.5 brings more sizing and positioning adjustments to improve emoji display in more situations.

name: Fixes to emoji sizing and text alignment.
body:
- Emojis should now align properly with text regardless of line-height.
- Increased emoji size to 1.3x parent element font-size (1.3em)
